Producer: Michael Patrick King, John P. Melfi, Sarah Jessica Parker, Darren Star
Production Co: HBO Films, Darren Star, Home Box Office (HBO), New Line Cinema
Synopsis: Fun, fashion and friendship continue to define the lives of Carrie (Sarah Jessica Parker), Samantha (Kim Cattrall), Charlotte (Kristin Davis) and Miranda. They have more than they ever wished for, but when the combination of marriage and motherhood approach, the gals take an exotic vacation in Abu Dhabi. The sun-drenched paradise holds many surprises -- especially for Carrie, who faces temptation when she unexpectedly runs into Aidan.
Title: Sex and the City 2
